name: Apple EarPods
description: Unlike traditional, circular earbuds, the design of the Apple EarPods is defined by the geometry of the ear.
specification: Enhanced Bass Response, Resistant to Sweat and Water Damage, Control Music and Video Playback

name: Audio-Technica ATH-M50 Headphones
description: With the ATH-M50 professional studio monitor headphones, Audio-Technica has achieved an exceptionally accurate response and long-wearing listening comfort.
specification: Exceptional audio quality for professional monitoring and mixing, adjustable padded headband for comfort during long mixing/recording sessions, 1 year warranty

name: Beats Solo HD On-Ear Headphone
description: Beats Solo HD headphones are made to be a lighter, on-ear version of Studios. Compact enough to fit in your pocket or bag.
specification: Every pair is now constructed of super-durable, flexible material, reinforced with a metal strip to make sure it never comes apart.

name: Bose AE2w Bluetooth Headphones
description: AE2w Bluetooth headphones let you enjoy immersive Bose sound from your iPad-plus wireless freedom.
specification: Enjoy immersive sound with wireless freedom, Cushioned around-ear fit for hours of comfortable listening, Wirelessly connects to your Bluetooth devices

name: Bose® QuietComfort® 15 Headphones
description: They're the best Bose headphones, period. QuietComfort 15 headphones feature exclusive Bose advancements in noise reduction technology.
specification: Significant noise reduction, TriPort acoustic headphone structure, Active equalization

name: Jawbone ERA Bluetooth Headset - Midnight
description: The Jawbone ERA is the only Bluetooth headset equipped with military-grade NoiseAssassin 3.0, the latest version of Jawbone's industry-first noise and wind canceling technology.
specification: Advanced Bluetooth headset in Shadowbox design with NoiseAssasin 3.0 noise and wind canceling technology for clear communication.

name: Jawbone ERA Bluetooth Headset - Shadowbox
description: The Jawbone ERA is the only Bluetooth headset equipped with military-grade NoiseAssassin 3.0, the latest version of Jawbone's industry-first noise and wind canceling technology.
specification: Advanced Bluetooth headset in Shadowbox design with NoiseAssasin 3.0 noise and wind canceling technology for clear communication.

name: JVC HAFX1X Headphones
description: The new three-model Xtreme Xplosives, or XX, series combines aggressive new design with JVC?s traditional high-quality build and style to meet the needs of today's music enthusiasts in comfort, sound and price.
specification: Gold plated 3.5mm plug,Cord Length: 3.93ft(1.2m), Good quality, noise reduction.

name: Logitech Wireless Gaming Headset G930 with 7.1 Surround Sound
description: Logitech wireless gaming headset g930 a fast wireless connection lets you level up without being tied down-and 7.1 surround sound puts you right in the middle of the action.
specification: Gaming-grade wireless: Reliable lag-free performance with up to 40 ft. wireless range (Actual wireless range will vary with use, settings and environmental conditions).

name: Plantronics GameCom 780 Surround Sound Stereo PC Gaming Headset
description: Enjoy exceptional sound quality, whether you're playing video games, listening to music, or making Internet calls, with the GameCom 780 Surround Sound Gaming Headset from Plantronics.
specification: Dolby Headphone and Pro Logic IIx technologies transform standard audio into a stunning 7.1 surround sound experience (Software is compatible with Windows systems only.

name: Sennheiser CX 300B MK II Precision Enhanced Bass Earbuds
description: Offering a powerful, bass-driven stereo sound with greater clarity and improved dynamics is the CX 300-II ear-canal phone.
specification: Excellent voice clarity and comfortable fit, Excellent bass response, Convenient carrying pouch included, Customizable ear adapter system achieves the perfect fit.

name: Sennheiser HD 202 Professional Headphones
description: The HD 202-II is a closed-back, around-the-ear stereo headphone featuring powerful bass reproduction.
specification: Ideal for DJ's and audio pros, Total harmonic distortion (THD): <0.5%, Very clean, deep bass response, Detachable ear cups for pro users

name: Sennheiser RS120 Over-Ear Headphones
description: The RS 120 is an RF wireless headphone system with open, supra-aural headphones. They feature a transparent, well-balanced sound with excellent bass reproduction, making them an ideal choice for both hi-fi and TV use.
specification: Detailed, Analytical Sound Reproduction With Strong, Bass Response, Perfectly Suitable For All Types Of Modern Music & Tv Applications

name: Skullcandy S2IKDY-010 Ink'd 2.0 Earbud Headphones with Mic
description: Skullcandy's best-selling INK'D earbuds feature a customizable fit and 11mm speaker drivers that tattoo your temporal lobes with full-color sonic art.
specification: 11mm drivers with neodymium magnets for full-range sound. Two sizes of silicone gel earbud sleeves for a perfect fit. 1.3-meter nylon braided cable with gold-plated 3.5mm plug.

name: Skullcandy S6SKFZ-003 Skullcrusher
description: The Skullcrusher boasts enough low-end WHOMP to buckle all comers, supplying the bass you need with clarity and precision dual-driver bass boost headphones.
specification: 30mm power drivers plus 30mm subwoofer. In-line subwoofer control. Stashable/collapsing travel design. Soft leather-touch ear pillows.

name: Sony MDR-V6 Headphones
description: A headset system designed for audio professionals.
specification: Samarium-cobalt magnets and 40mm drivers for powerful, detailed sound, Over-ear design provides comfort and outstanding reduction of external noises

name: Sony MDR-ZX100 ZX Series Headphones
description: This lightweight and comfortable package is ideal for life on-the-go.
specification: Closed-type supra-aural headphones with 30mm drivers, high quality and powerful sound, lightweight for maximum comfort

name: Sony MDRRF985RK Wireless RF Headphone
description: Untangle your mind and relax with crisp, personal audio without wires. They also feature a comfortable headband and long battery life up to 25 hours.
specification: Wireless FM headphones for cord-free listening. 40mm driver units for expressive sound. Easy-adjust headband for long term comfort.

name: Turtle Beach Call of Duty: Black Ops II
description: The future is now with the Turtle Beach Call of Duty: Black Ops II Ear Force Tango Limited Edition Headset.
specification: Black Ops II - Optimized customizable presets. Black Ops II Voice prompts; Adjustable Surround Sound Angles. Rechargeable Battery.

name: Turtle Beach Ear Force PX51 Premium Wireless Dolby Digital Gaming Headset
description: To compete with the best players, you need the best equipment. PX51 gives you the Turtle Beach audio advantage with interference-free.
specification: Dual-Band Wi-Fi Wireless - Interference-free wireless means clearer chat and game audio.
